actions.recommendation: To limit cardiovascular risk maintain BMI <25 and waist to height ratio <50%

Marius the most important issue that we picked up today is your slightly raised fasting insulin level. As discussed this can be a sign of insulin resistance/pre diabetes. I would encourage you to make lifestyle changes as discussed and to recheck your level in 3 months time. If it remains high please follow up with us or your GP for further assessment and assistance in managing it.
CoEnzyme Q10 , Zinc , Vitamin B co
